text: This would amusing on its own, but it's made doubly hilarious when you remember that Blake Lively, Reynolds' wife , starred in Sisterhood Of The Traveling Pants 1 and 2. This mention is basically a cameo for Lively, who has been busy filming A Simple Favor and The Rhythm Section . We're still holding out for these two to team up again since they both starred in Green Lantern, but if this is the beginning of a trend of the two shading each other in their movies, then we're just as on board with that as well.
